name: FigMax: Animating Transitions (sample files)
description:
Play around with these Polaris-based sample files, and use them to follow along with the class as we learn to make prototyping animations.


NOTE: Shopify's design system, Polaris, doest not include specs for a tabbed nav bar. I designed one (using Polaris icons) to illustrate a point about animation behavior during the workshop.
